android.car.evs

类 CarEvsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.CarManagerBase
      • android.car.evs.CarEvsManager

  • public final class CarEvsManager
extends CarManagerBase
    Provides an application interface for interativing with the Extended View System service.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  CarEvsManager.CarEvsError 
      static interface  CarEvsManager.CarEvsServiceState 
      static interface  CarEvsManager.CarEvsServiceType 
      static interface  CarEvsManager.CarEvsStatusListener
      Application registers #CarEvsStatusListener object to receive requests to control the activity and monitor the status of the EVS service.
      static interface  CarEvsManager.CarEvsStreamCallback
      Application registers #CarEvsStreamCallback object to listen to EVS services' status changes.
      static interface  CarEvsManager.CarEvsStreamEvent 

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int ERROR_BUSY
      Status to tell CarEvsService is busy to serve the privileged client.
      static int ERROR_NONE
      Status to tell that a request is successfully processed.
      static int ERROR_UNAVAILABLE
      Status to tell a requested service is not available.
      static java.lang.String EXTRA_SESSION_TOKEN 
      static int SERVICE_STATE_ACTIVE
      State that a corresponding service type is actively being used.
      static int SERVICE_STATE_INACTIVE
      State that a corresponding service type is inactive; it's available but not used by any clients.
      static int SERVICE_STATE_REQUESTED
      State that CarEvsManager received a service request from the client.
      static int SERVICE_STATE_UNAVAILABLE
      State that a corresponding service type is not available.
      static int SERVICE_TYPE_DRIVERVIEW
      Service type to represent the camera service that captures the scene with the driver.
      static int SERVICE_TYPE_FRONT_PASSENGERSVIEW
      Service type to represent the camera service that captures the scene with the front-seat passengers.
      static int SERVICE_TYPE_FRONTVIEW
      Service type to represent the front exterior view camera service.
      static int SERVICE_TYPE_LEFTVIEW
      Service type to represent the left exterior view camera service such as the virtual side mirror.
      static int SERVICE_TYPE_REAR_PASSENGERSVIEW
      Service type to represent the camera service that captures the scene with the rear-seat passengers.
      static int SERVICE_TYPE_REARVIEW
      Service type to represent the rearview camera service.
      static int SERVICE_TYPE_RIGHTVIEW
      Service type to represent the right exterior view camera service such as the virtual side mirror.
      static int SERVICE_TYPE_SURROUNDVIEW
      Service type to represent the surround view service.
      static int SERVICE_TYPE_USER_DEFINED
      Service type to represent the camera service that captures the scene the user defines.
      static int STREAM_EVENT_FRAME_DROPPED
      EVS stream event to notify that a video stream is dropped.
      static int STREAM_EVENT_NONE
      This is a default EVS stream event type.
      static int STREAM_EVENT_OTHER_ERRORS
      Other EVS stream errors
      static int STREAM_EVENT_PARAMETER_CHANGED
      EVS stream event occurs when a camera parameter is changed.
      static int STREAM_EVENT_PRIMARY_OWNER_CHANGED
      EVS stream event to notify the primary owner has been changed.
      static int STREAM_EVENT_STREAM_STARTED
      EVS stream event to notify a video stream has been started.
      static int STREAM_EVENT_STREAM_STOPPED
      EVS stream event to notify a video stream has been stopped.
      static int STREAM_EVENT_TIMEOUT
      EVS stream event occurs when a timer for a new frame's arrival is expired.

        mCar

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      CarEvsManager(Car car, IBinder service)
      Gets an instance of CarEvsManager CarEvsManager manages com.android.car.evs.CarEvsService and provides APIs that the clients can use the Extended View System service.

      Requests the system to start an activity for #CarEvsServiceType.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • CarEvsManager

        public CarEvsManager(Car car,
                     IBinder service)
        Gets an instance of CarEvsManager CarEvsManager manages com.android.car.evs.CarEvsService and provides APIs that the clients can use the Extended View System service. This must not be obtained directly by clients, use Car.getCarManager(String) instead.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onCarDisconnected

        public void onCarDisconnected()
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase

      • setStatusListener

        public void setStatusListener(java.util.concurrent.Executor executor,
                              CarEvsManager.CarEvsStatusListener listener)
        Sets #CarEvsStatusListener object to receive requests to control the activity view and EVS data.
        参数:
        executor - Executor to execute callbacks.
        listener - #CarEvsStatusListener to register.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this method is called while a registered status listener exists.

      • clearStatusListener

        public void clearStatusListener()
        Stops getting callbacks to control the camera viewing activity by clearing #CarEvsStatusListener object.

      • returnFrameBuffer

        public void returnFrameBuffer(CarEvsBufferDescriptor buffer)
        Returns a consumed CarEvsBufferDescriptor.
        参数:
        buffer - CarEvsBufferDescriptor to be returned to the EVS service.

      • startActivity

        public int startActivity(int type)
        Requests the system to start an activity for #CarEvsServiceType.
        参数:
        type - A type of EVS service to start.
        返回:
        #CarEvsError to tell the result of the request. ERROR_UNAVAILABLE will be returned if the CarEvsService is not connected to the native EVS service or the binder transaction fails. ERROR_BUSY will be returned if the CarEvsService is in the SERVICE_STATE_REQUESTED for a different service type. If the same service type is running, this will return ERROR_NONE. ERROR_NONE will be returned for all other cases.

      • stopActivity

        public void stopActivity()
        Requests the system to stop a current activity launched via startActivity(int).

      • startVideoStream

        public int startVideoStream(int type,
                            IBinder token,
                            java.util.concurrent.Executor executor,
                            CarEvsManager.CarEvsStreamCallback callback)
        Requests to start a video stream from #CarEvsServiceType.
        参数:
        type - A type of EVS service.
        token - A session token that is issued to privileged clients. SystemUI must obtain this token obtain this via generateSessionToken() and pass it to the activity, to prioritize its service requests. TODO(b/179517136): Defines an Intent extra
        callback - #CarEvsStreamCallback to listen to the stream.
        executor - Executor to run a callback.
        返回:
        #CarEvsError to tell the result of the request. ERROR_UNAVAILABLE will be returned if the CarEvsService is not connected to the native EVS service or the binder transaction fails. ERROR_BUSY will be returned if the CarEvsService is handling a service request with a valid session token. ERROR_NONE for all other cases.

      • stopVideoStream

        public void stopVideoStream()
        Requests to stop a current #CarEvsServiceType.

      • getCurrentStatus

        public CarEvsStatus getCurrentStatus()
        Queries the current status of CarEvsService
        返回:
        CarEvsStatus that describes current status of CarEvsService.

      • generateSessionToken

        public IBinder generateSessionToken()
        Generates a service session token.
        返回:
        IBinder object as a service session token.

      • isSupported

        public boolean isSupported(int type)
        Returns whether or not a given service type is supported.
        参数:
        type - CarEvsManager.CarEvsServiceType to query
        返回:
        true if a given service type is available on the system.
